tuv.seg: Transporte
Transportation

Si el niño califica para recibir servicios de transportación de educación especial, por favor describa el plan de transportación, incluyendo cualquier condición especial necesaria para una transportación segura
If the child qualifies for special education transportation, please describe the plan for transportation, including any special conditions necessary for safe transport
Evaluación
Assessment
Debido al desarrollo académico y funcional del estudiante, el niño participará en la siguiente evaluación alterna
Due to the student's academic and functional performance, the child will participate in the following alternate assessment

tu.tuid: Child is required to attend a facility other than the normal attendance facility

Child is required to attend a facility other than the normal attendance facility

tu.tuid: Nature of the child's disability is such that special education transportation is required
